languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс вздрагивает, когда перед ним появляетесь вы. Еще мгновение он медлит — а затем, бессильно сжав кулаки, отводит взгляд.{/n} "Прости меня, {name}. Я... на мгновение помрачнился рассудком".
{n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс вздрагивает, когда перед ним появляетесь вы. Еще мгновение он медлит — а затем, бессильно сжав кулаки, отводит взгляд.{/n} "Прости меня, {name}. Я... на мгновение помрачнился рассудком".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたが姿を現すと、ハインリックスはたじろぐ。一瞬ためらってから、弱々しく拳を握って目をそらす。{/n}「すまない、{name}。我は…しばし動転していた」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが姿を現すと、ハインリックスはたじろぐ。一瞬ためらってから、弱々しく拳を握って目をそらす。{/n}「すまない、{name}。我は…しばし動転していた」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}看到你插手，海因里希向后退了半步。他迟疑片刻，无力地攥住拳头，移开了目光。{/n}“对不起，{name}。我……我冲动了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}看到你插手，海因里希向后退了半步。他迟疑片刻，无力地攥住拳头，移开了目光。{/n}“对不起，{name}。我……我冲动了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tressaille en vous voyant devant lui. Il hésite encore un instant, puis détourne le regard en serrant les poings d'impuissance.{/n} « Je suis désolé, {name}. J'ai... perdu la tête. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tressaille en vous voyant devant lui. Il hésite encore un instant, puis détourne le regard en serrant les poings d'impuissance.{/n} « Je suis désolé, {name}. J'ai... perdu la tête. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se estremece cuando apareces ante él. Duda otro instante y luego, apretando los puños con impotencia, mira hacia otro lado.{/n} «Lo siento, {name}. No sé... qué me ha podido pasar».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se estremece cuando apareces ante él. Duda otro instante y luego, apretando los puños con impotencia, mira hacia otro lado.{/n} «Lo siento, {name}. No sé... qué me ha podido pasar».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix zuckt bei deinem Anblick zusammen. Er zögert noch einen Augenblick, ehe er hilflos die Fäuste ballt und seinen Blick abwendet.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, {name}. Ich ... habe mich für einen Moment vergessen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix zuckt bei deinem Anblick zusammen. Er zögert noch einen Augenblick, ehe er hilflos die Fäuste ballt und seinen Blick abwendet.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, {name}. Ich ... habe mich für einen Moment vergessen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Karşısına geçtiğinde Heinrix irkiliyor. Bir an daha duraksıyor, ardından da yumruklarını güçsüzce sıkıp başını çeviriyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim {name}. Bir anlığına... Aklım başımdan gitti."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix flinches when you appear before him. He hesitates for another moment, and then, clenching his fists impotently, he looks away.{/n} "I am sorry, {name}. I... lost my head for a moment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Karşısına geçtiğinde Heinrix irkiliyor. Bir an daha duraksıyor, ardından da yumruklarını güçsüzce sıkıp başını çeviriyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim {name}. Bir anlığına... Aklım başımdan gitti."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
